subtitles_text: >> Jeff: PREVIOUSLY ON "SURVIVOR": THE OMETEPE SIX
LEARNED THAT ONCE THEY DEFEATED
THE ENTIRE ENEMY TRIBE, THE
BATTLE WAS ONLY BEGINNING.
BECAUSE NOW THEY HAD TO FACE EACH OTHER.
>> ONE OF US HAS TO GO TO REDEMPTION ISLAND.
>> Jeff: SO ROB CUT DEALS WITH EVERYONE.
>> WE DECIDE WHO GOES WHEN, AND THAT'S IT.
BRAD THINKS IT'S ME AND HIM.
NATALIE THINKS IT'S ME AND HER.
AS LONG AS EVERYBODY THINKS
THEY'VE GOT A PIECE SOMEWHERE,
I'LL BE ALL SET.

>> THE ONLY PERSON I REALLY,
TRULY TRUST OUT HERE IS ROB.
>> Jeff: MEANWHILE...

WAS THE BEST BET TO TAKE TO THE END.

EVERYONE IN MY TRIBE FEELS THAT THEIR BEST CHANCE

DIFFERENT STRATEGIES, THEY ALL
AGREED ANDREA WAS THE BIGGEST THREAT.
>> SHE'S ONE OF THE STRONGEST
COMPETITORS IN THE GAME.

THE TRIBE BANDED TOGETHER TO
BLINDSIDE THE FIRST MEMBER OF
THEIR ALLIANCE.
ANDREA.

ALLY, MATT, FOR A CHANCE TO GET BACK IN THE GAME.

THERE'S NOWHERE LEFT TO HIDE.

WE BLINDSIDED ANDREA.

EVIL WAY IT'S KIND OF FUN TO
SEE, LIKE, THEIR REACTION, HOW
SHOCKED THEY ARE, AND SHE WAS
DEFINITELY SHOCKED.
YOU COULD TELL.

WE'RE THE LAST GIRLS STANDING?
>> YEAH!
>> I'M NOT GOING TO LIE, I'M
KIND OF GLAD TO SEE ANDREA GONE.
